mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(B.ORG_TREE_NAME)) FROM TB_ORG_ORGTREE_REL A, TB_ORG_TREE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ORG_TREE_ID = B.ORG_TREE_ID AND A.ORG_ID = #{orgId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_ORG_TREE A,TB_ORG_REL_TYPE B,TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF C WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND B.STATUS_CD='1000' AND C.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.ORG_TREE_ID=C.ORG_TREE_ID AND B.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID=C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND B.REF_CODE= #{refCode}

SELECT A.ORG_TREE_ID orgTreeId,A.ORG_TREE_NAME orgTreeName,A.ORG_TREE_TYPE orgTreeType,A.ORG_ID orgId,A.STATUS_CD statusCd,A.SORT sort FROM TB_ORG_TREE A,TB_ORG_REL_TYPE B,TB_OGT_ORG_RELTYPE_CONF C WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND B.STATUS_CD='1000' AND C.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.ORG_TREE_ID=C.ORG_TREE_ID AND B.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID=C.ORG_REL_TYPE_ID AND B.REF_CODE= #{refCode}
